results.title: L-Arginine enhances the triglyceride-lowering effect of simvastatin in patients with elevated plasma triglycerides.
results.text_hl: The combination of @CHEMICAL_Arginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001120 @@@L-arginine@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ led to a significantly stronger reduction in @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@ compared to placebo plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (-140.5 +/- 149.2 mg/dL vs -56.1 +/- 85.0 mg/dL; P = .048).
